composition: All funds are locked in Naira (NGN)
No diversification or exposure to other currencies, assets, or markets
No reinvestment or compounding of interest
ASQ109K.strategy_and_holdings: Fixed-term deposit product that offers high interest rates and discipline. Suitable for saving for specific goals or expenses in the near future. Requires commitment and planning ahead. No flexibility or access to funds during the term.
performance_and_fees: No fees or charges to use FairLock
No penalties for early withdrawal (not allowed) or late payment (automatic)
trading_rules_and_restrictions: Funds cannot be withdrawn before maturity
Funds cannot be added to existing plans
Plans cannot be modified or cancelled once created
